subject: Boats and Boating
Sailboats and Sailing
Vendee Globe Challenge
lead_paragraph: Ryan Breymaier has been training for the Imoca Ocean Masters New York to Barcelona race, in which he will sail across the Atlantic against four other teams starting Sunday.
snippet: Ryan Breymaier has been training for the Imoca Ocean Masters New York to Barcelona race, in which he will sail across the Atlantic against four other teams starting Sunday.
